text: William F. Poe (July 22, 1931 – May 1, 2014) was the mayor of Tampa, Florida from 1974 to 1979. He later served as the Chairman of a Florida-based property and casualty insurance company. He served in the Air Force, and received his Bachelor's degree from the University of Florida. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:University of Florida alumni Category:Mayors of Tampa, Florida Category:Businesspeople from Tampa, Florida
title: William F. Poe
